title: Embroidery Sample
description: geometric embroidery with human figures in 2 x 2 1/8\" squares on black separated by bands of stars 1 1/2\" wide;  3 1/2\" indigo border; embroidery colors white, pink, blue, green and red
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
